activities:
VoiceFive Networks, Inc. compiles information from surveys completed by internet users. This information is used to create research reports on Internet trends and e-commerce activities. The IP address of European users is transmitted to the United States. Additionally, VoiceFive Networks, Inc. may compile Internet usage information from Internet research panel members who install software provided by
VoiceFive. Panel members explicitly consent to join the panel for the purpose of participating in market research in exchange for promotions offered by VoiceFive Networks, Inc., and its partners. During registration, panel members may submit their names and other personally identifiable information (PII) for the purposes of facilitating communications with VoiceFive Networks, Inc. or for
receiving promotions. VoiceFive Networks, Inc. may provide PII about panel members to a client who commissions an Internet research panel,but only when such transfer is explicitly stated in the commissioned panel’s Privacy Policy.
corpofftitle1: Chief Privacy Officer, Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: VoiceFive, Inc. is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union and Switzerland or their authorized representatives.
